meanings.definition: A Mexican vine (Turbina corymbosa) with seeds containing hallucinogenic properties.
meanings.sent1: The ololiuhqui plant grows in Mexico.
meanings.sent2: People use ololiuhqui seeds in rituals.
meanings.sent3: The ololiuhqui vine must have interesting seeds!
meanings.sent4: Her mind soared like she had ingested ololiuhqui seeds.
meanings.sent5: The hallucinogenic properties of ololiuhqui seeds are well-known.

meanings.definition: The seeds of this vine, used in traditional Mesoamerican rituals for their psychoactive effects.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a party with ololiuhqui seeds as confetti!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts danced like ololiuhqui seeds in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The psychoactive effects of ololiuhqui seeds are fascinating.
